description:
Taxed petrol

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73431 Energy tax statistics

Definition:
This variable covers unleaded and leaded petrol, excluding
aviation gasoline. This refers to petrol of subheadings 2710
11 41 to 2710 11 49 of the Combined Nomenclature (including
biofuel).


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Taxed petrol
